requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:

CPU: Pentium 4 or Athlon XP equivalent

CPU SPEED: 1.5 Ghz

RAM: 384 MB

OS: Windows 98SE/ME/2000/XP (NT & 95 not supported)

VIDEO CARD: 64 MB NVIDIA GeForce3, ATI Radeon 8500 or equivalent Direct3D-capable video card)

TOTAL VIDEO RAM: 64 MB

3D: Yes

PIXEL SHADER: 1.1

DIRECTX VERSION: 9.0c

SOUND CARD: Yes

FREE DISK SPACE: 1.5 GB free hard disk space plus addition space for saved games, replays, and/or Scenario Editor maps.
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:

CPU: Pentium 4 or Athlon XP

CPU SPEED: 2.8 Ghz

RAM: 768 MB

OS: Windows XP

VIDEO CARD: 128 MB NVIDIA GeForce4, ATI Radeon 9600 or equivalent Direct3D-capable video card)

TOTAL VIDEO RAM: 128 MB

3D: Yes

HARDWARE T&L: Yes

PIXEL SHADER: 1.3

VERTEX SHADER: 1.1

DIRECTX VERSION: 9.0

SOUND CARD: Yes

FREE DISK SPACE: 1.5 GB free hard disk space plus addition space for saved games, replays, and/or Scenario Editor maps.
